caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. NICK CASTALDI,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Second Department.

opinion.posture: Application by the appellant for a writ of error coram nobis to vacate, on the ground of ineffective assistance of appellate counsel, a decision and order of this Court dated December 12, 2005 (People v. Castaldi, 24 AD3d 567 [2005]), affirming a judgment of the County Court, Suffolk County, rendered October 10, 2000.
opinion.attorneys:
Nick Castaldi, Romulus, N.Y., appellant pro se.
Thomas J. Spota, District Attorney, Riverhead, N.Y. (Karla Lato of counsel), for respondent.
Richard J. Barbuto, Mineola, N.Y., former appellate counsel.
opinion.panel: Before: Schmidt, J.P., Adams, Luciano and Covello, JJ., concur.
opinion.opinion_text:
Ordered that the application is denied.
The appellant has failed to establish that he was denied the effective assistance of appellate counsel (see Jones v. Barnes,463 US 745 [1983]; People v. Stultz, 2 NY3d 277 [2004]).
